links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (27, -242, 720).
formula: If we define f(m,j,x)=sum(binomial(m,k)*stirling2(k,j)*x^(m-k),k=j..m) then a(n-2)=f(n,2,8), (n>=2). - _Milan Janjic_, Apr 26 2009Contribution from Harvey P. Dale, Oct 25 2011: (Start)  a(0)=1, a(1)=27, a(2)=487, a(n)=27*a(n-1)-242*a(n-2)+720*a(n-3).  a(n) = 2^(2+3*(n+1))+2^(n+1)*5^(2+n)-9^(2+n). (End)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Typo in formula fixed by Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 26 2011
